'''Halva''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in [[Sumeru City]], [[Sumeru]]. During the daytime, she is at the docks being reprimanded by [[Shahbandar]] and at nighttime, she is in Menakeri's Treasure Shop.

{{Dialogue Start}}

==Dialogue==
===Daytime===
{{Transclude|Shahbandar|Daytime}}

===Nighttime===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Halva:''' Heh, I wonder what new stock the shop's got in today...!
:{{DIcon}} Picking out some jewels?
::'''Halva:''' Ah, no. I'm just admiring them is all.
::'''Halva:''' I may not be able to afford anything like this as a trainee tax officer, but just being able to look at such shiny and beautiful things brings me joy.
::'''Halva:''' *sigh* It's hard not to doubt yourself when your superior is always scolding you for being childish...
::'''Halva:''' So, when I'm not working, I look at the things I like to blow off steam.
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Halva:''' Later, I'm gonna look around some more.
{{Dialogue End}}
